conbody.p: After you send a request, Katalon Studio supports reading its response in a separate Response view. A service response comprises Status, Elapsed time, and Size fields; Body section, Header, and Verification Log.

ul.li: Status: The status code of the response
Elapsed: The total time that starts from the request is sent until Katalon Studio receives the last byte of the response
Size: Size of the response package.
